languages.text: Несмотря на чудовищные плазменные залпы, которыми еретический крейсер поливал все живое, эскадрилья десантных шаттлов добралась до цели. Пилоты говорили, будто некая "живая аквила" очертила кораблям слепую зону врага.

Flying through the hailstorm of plasma unleashed upon all living things by the heretical vessel, our shuttles successfully reached the target. The pilots later described a "living Aquila" guiding the ships through the enemy's blind spot.
languages.original_text: Несмотря на чудовищные плазменные залпы, которыми еретический крейсер поливал все живое, эскадрилья десантных шаттлов добралась до цели. Пилоты говорили, будто некая "живая аквила" очертила кораблям слепую зону врага.

traits.locale_text: Flying through the hailstorm of plasma unleashed upon all living things by the heretical ship, our shuttles did reach the target. The pilots later described a "living Aquila" guiding the ships through the enemy's blind spot.

Flying through the hailstorm of plasma unleashed upon all living things by the heretical ship, our shuttles did reach the target. The pilots later described a "living Aquila" guiding the ships through the enemy's blind spot.

Flying through the hailstorm of plasma unleashed upon all living things by the heretical vessel, our shuttles successfully reached the target. The pilots later described a "living Aquila" guiding the ships through the enemy's blind spot.

Flying through the hailstorm of plasma unleashed upon all living things by the heretical vessel, our shuttles successfully reached the target. The pilots later described a "living Aquila" guiding the ships through the enemy's blind spot.

Flying through the hailstorm of plasma unleashed upon all living things by the heretical vessel, our shuttles successfully reached the target. The pilots later described a "living Aquila" guiding the ships through the enemy's blind spot.

Flying through the hailstorm of plasma unleashed upon all living things by the heretical vessel, our shuttles successfully reached the target. The pilots later described a "living Aquila" guiding the ships through the enemy's blind spot.

languages.text: 那些异端分子的飞船上降下了等离子冰雹，而我们的穿梭机却顺利突破了冰雹，成功抵达了目标区域。据穿梭机驾驶员们事后声称，当时出现了一只“活生生的双头鹰”，引导舰船穿过了敌人的视野盲区。
languages.original_text: Flying through the hailstorm of plasma unleashed upon all living things by the heretical vessel, our shuttles successfully reached the target. The pilots later described a "living Aquila" guiding the ships through the enemy's blind spot.

traits.locale_text: 那些异端分子的飞船上降下了等离子冰雹，而我们的穿梭机却顺利突破了冰雹，成功抵达了目标区域。据穿梭机驾驶员们事后声称，当时出现了一只“活生生的双头鹰”，引导舰船穿过了敌人的视野盲区。

languages.text: 異端の船が生きとし生けるものすべてに放ったプラズマ嵐を飛び越え、私たちのシャトルは無事に目標地点に到着した。パイロットたちは後に、敵の死角を導く「生きたアクィラ」がいたと語った。
languages.original_text: Flying through the hailstorm of plasma unleashed upon all living things by the heretical vessel, our shuttles successfully reached the target. The pilots later described a "living Aquila" guiding the ships through the enemy's blind spot.

traits.locale_text: 異端の船が生きとし生けるものすべてに放ったプラズマ嵐を飛び越え、私たちのシャトルは無事に目標地点に到着した。パイロットたちは後に、敵の死角を導く「生きたアクィラ」がいたと語った。

languages.text: Unsere Shuttles flogen durch den Hagelsturm aus Plasma, den das ketzerische Schiff gegen alle Lebewesen entfesselt hatte und erreichten erfolgreich das Ziel. Die Piloten sprachen später von einem "lebenden Aquila", der die Schiffe durch den toten Winkel des Feindes geführt hatte.
languages.original_text: Flying through the hailstorm of plasma unleashed upon all living things by the heretical vessel, our shuttles successfully reached the target. The pilots later described a "living Aquila" guiding the ships through the enemy's blind spot.

traits.locale_text: Unsere Shuttles flogen durch den Hagelsturm aus Plasma, den das ketzerische Schiff gegen alle Lebewesen entfesselt hatte und erreichten erfolgreich das Ziel. Die Piloten sprachen später von einem "lebenden Aquila", der die Schiffe durch den toten Winkel des Feindes geführt hatte.

languages.text: Kâfir geminin her canlıya yağdırdığı plazma sağanağını yararak ilerleyen mekiklerimiz, hedefe sağ salim erişti. Pilotlar, düşmanın kör noktasından gemilere yol gösteren "canlı bir Çift Başlı Kartal"dan söz etti.
languages.original_text: Flying through the hailstorm of plasma unleashed upon all living things by the heretical vessel, our shuttles successfully reached the target. The pilots later described a "living Aquila" guiding the ships through the enemy's blind spot.

traits.locale_text: Kâfir geminin her canlıya yağdırdığı plazma sağanağını yararak ilerleyen mekiklerimiz hedefe sağ salim erişti. Pilotlar, düşmanın kör noktasından gemilere yol gösteren "canlı bir Çiftebaş"tan söz ettiler.

languages.text: Nuestras lanzaderas atraviesan la lluvia de plasma que desata la nave hereje contra todos los seres vivos y llegan a su objetivo. Más tarde, los pilotos describieron a un «Aquila viviente» que guiaba a las naves por el punto ciego del enemigo.
languages.original_text: Flying through the hailstorm of plasma unleashed upon all living things by the heretical vessel, our shuttles successfully reached the target. The pilots later described a "living Aquila" guiding the ships through the enemy's blind spot.

traits.locale_text: Nuestras lanzaderas atraviesan la lluvia de plasma que desata la nave hereje contra todos los seres vivos y llegan a su objetivo. Más tarde, los pilotos describieron a un «Aquila viviente» que guiaba a las naves por el punto ciego del enemigo.

languages.text: Nos navettes ont réussi à atteindre la cible en évitant miraculeusement le déluge de plasma tiré par le vaisseau hérétique. Plus tard, les pilotes ont décrit un « Aquila vivant » qui avait guidé les vaisseaux dans l'angle mort de l'ennemi.
languages.original_text: Flying through the hailstorm of plasma unleashed upon all living things by the heretical vessel, our shuttles successfully reached the target. The pilots later described a "living Aquila" guiding the ships through the enemy's blind spot.

traits.locale_text: Nos navettes ont réussi à atteindre la cible en évitant miraculeusement le déluge de plasma tiré par le vaisseau hérétique. Plus tard, les pilotes ont décrit un « Aquila vivant » qui avait guidé les vaisseaux dans l'angle mort de l'ennemi.
